title: Small pond : funky frogs collect stamps
brief_description: This is a short promotional video made to explain the story behind the Australia Post ‘Small pond’ stamp collection. Designers of the stamps describe how they came up with their ideas and designs, as well as a short description of the animals depicted on the stamps. It gives a brief explanation of how important the study/research of frogs is to understanding out natural environment.
